cal_id.description: id de calibrado, para utilizar salida de pron√≥stico

main_qualifier.description: if qualifier == 'all', set this qualifier as the main qualifier

previous_runs_timestart.description: If set, retrieves previous forecast runs with forecast_date posterior to the chosen date and concatenates the results into a single series

forecast_timestart.description: Begin date of last forecast run. If last forecast date is older than this value, it raises an error

warmup.description: Skip this number of initial steps from the fit procedure

tail.description: Use only this number of final steps for the fit procedure

sim_range.description: Fit using only pairs where values are within this range
